basic_info.description: Hi! I'm Seth Pierce. I'm 24 years old and I'm currently learning to become a Full-Stack Javascript Developer at CodeFellows. I spent 4 years in the Marine Corps as a diesel mechanic and I'm hoping to make a change in careers and grow as a Developer through Code Fellows.

projects.title: Tech-folio
projects.description: My final project for CodeFellows 201 class. It was a great opportunity to work with others and create something that I'm proud of. It allows the user to store and manage projects and then get a sample display of a portfolio with those projects displayed.

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: One of my first projects for Code 201 at Codefellows. I mainly learned about tables and flexbox during this project, as well as forms.

projects.title: Odd-Duck
projects.description: One of my projects from Code 201 at CodeFellows. I had fun with this project learning ChartJS and some simple animations with keyframes!
